name: Balls Go High
description:
Jump high over hills, pass the best gate, and get as many balls as you can!
Looking for some satisfaction and challenge?
Then this ball game is just for you!

Features:
• Easy to play with just one-finger swipe
• The multipliers will help you to get more and more balls
• Addictive and satisfying collect gameplay
• See if you are the top collector on the leaderboard
• Enjoy the fun game with the vivid colors
